quest.name: To Be Second Best
journal: Y'mhitra is eager for news of her sister.

After gratefully listening to news of her sister and other recent events, Y'mhitra informs you that Summoner Jajasamu, a member of the Immortal Flames' summoner squad, would appreciate your counsel on some undisclosed matter. It seems the lieutenant is currently on leave and taking his ease at the Carline Canopy...if you have a moment or two to spare.

You meet with Summoner Jajasamu, and the veteran mercenary speaks of his experience fighting alongside two young folk blessed with a resistance to primal influence. He seems bothered by the thought that their presence on the front line is less a choice than an imposed duty, and would have you ask their feelings on the issue. Arenvald, the more approachable of the pair, is to be found in Rhalgr's Reach.

You locate Arenvald with little trouble, and together you pay a visit to Fordola's cell in the city. The ensuing exchange reveals much about the young warriors and the motivations which drive them, but the ever-bitter Fordola soon bids you leave her be. Relenting to her wishes, you and Arenvald withdraw outside to the streets of the Ala Mhigan Quarter.

Putting aside Arenvald's revealing sentiment at glimpsing Fordola's true feelings, it would seem you've been given an answer to Jajasamu's concerns. Return to the Carline Canopy, and report to the lieutenant.

Upon hearing of Arenvald and Fordola's determination, Jajasamu himself resolves to provide the finest support he can muster─even if that means becoming the “second-best summoner in Eorzea.” He bids you send his regards to Y'mhitra before going on his way.

You return to Y'mhitra, and although she cannot claim you as a mentor, the scholar nevertheless seems inspired by the effect you have on your colleagues. To perfect the summoner's art and encourage the hearts of others─this is the proud burden you are fated to bear.
objectives: Speak with Jajasamu at the Carline Canopy.
Wait at the designated location in Rhalgr's Reach.
Speak with Jajasamu at the Carline Canopy.
Speak with Y'mhitra at Apkallu Falls.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To accept this quest, you must abandon the summoner job quest “To Be Second Best.” Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: Forename! I was just about to contact the Scions to ask after my sister, and here you are to provide a report in person! What news?

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: ...To the First!? One of the thirteen reflections, you mean...!?

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: I had thought my field of expertise a complicated one, but I struggle to comprehend the enormity of your tale. Still, Shtola seems to be faring well enough, and for that I am grateful.

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: Ah, yes! Before I forget, I actually had a message to pass on to you.

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: Do you recall Summoner Jajasamu? Formerly of the Company of Heroes and current member of the Immortal Flames' summoner squad? He commands both an Ifrit- and Titan-Egi, and is likely one of the more seasoned...ahem. Well, I am sure you remember.

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: He is in Gridania on leave, as it happens, and asked me to direct you to the Carline Canopy should you stop by for one of your unpredictable visits.

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: I believe he wished to consult you on some private matter... 'Twould be kind of you to lend him an ear if you've a moment or two to spare.

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: Have you spoken with the lieutenant? I believe he wishes to speak with you summoner-to-summoner.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: ...Bloody hells! I was just thinkin' about ye, an' there ye are! Y'mhitra had a word on me behalf, I take it? Well, let's not stand on ceremony...

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: I'll not mince words with ye─I need some advice concernin' summoners in mortal combat.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: They tell me ye've a special nature what prevents primals from enthrallin' yer mind.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: So what I want to know is, what's yer thinkin' on bein' sent out to the front lines every time a beast tribe scrapes together a pile o' crystals?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: That's just the way of things.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I'm happy to be able to help.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Such is yer fate, ye mean? So ye give in to the inevitable, and fight because it's yer duty to do so?

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: So ye just see it as yer rightful place? Folk need yer help, an' ye've been blessed with the means to help 'em...?

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Well, that's one way o' lookin' at it. Me, I'm in it for the coin─have been ever since I sold me spells with the Company o' Heroes.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Most o' the soldiers I march with ain't much different. We're happy to put our lives on the line as long as there's a purse waitin' for us at the end o' the day. The pair what joined in on our last skirmish, though...now there's a whole 'nother story.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Ye've heard of Arenvald an' Fordola, aye?

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: The lad's one o' the Scions, same as you. No mystery there.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: As for the lass...she's a bit more complicated. Former officer in the imperial army, captured by the Resistance an' steps away from the noose. Fightin' for Ala Mhigo as a conscript now, which is the only reason she's still breathin'.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Barely more'n sprouts, the both of 'em, an' they was deployed with the Flames to assist with downin' Ifrit.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: From what I hear, they share yer resistance to primal influence. An' that's why─that's the whole reason they had the dubious honor of standin' in the thick o' the flames.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, me an' me fellow summoners was cowerin' in the shadows, sendin' out our egi to support these youngsters what've seen less than forty summers between 'em.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Can't say I cared much for the experience. It bothered me to think they was bein' made to fight a battle what weren't theirs, just because o' who they are.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Do ye think ye could talk to 'em for me? Ask how they feel about the whole thing? Yer about the only person I can turn to...

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Me thanks. Ye'll find Arenvald in Rhalgr's Reach, an' he'll know where to find Fordola. I'll tell him to meet you by the aetheryte.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Arenvald was in Rhalgr's Reach last I heard. If ye could ask 'em me questions, it'd sure help me sleep at night...

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. I've been told you need my help with something. If you give me a moment, I'll meet you over by the aetheryte.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Forename, I heard you had returned from Jajasamu! What can I do for our honored champion?

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Jajasamu said that...? Aye, we joined them against Ifrit, but I'd thought him more annoyed by our presence than concerned for our well-being.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Hm, why don't I save you some time and include Fordola in this conversation. We can visit her in her cell over in the city.

dialogue.name: GUARDS04033
dialogue.text: If you're waiting for the lad in silver armor, he should be out of there soon.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: She still snarls like a chained dog...

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: Amidst all that growling, though, she gave us a glimpse of her true self. Enough that I'll know when to lend a shoulder, even if she wouldn't let me see her suffering...

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: N-Now don't be getting the wrong idea! Same age, same homeland─I can't help but care a little about what happens to her!

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: A-Anyway, I have my own training to think of. Give my regards to Summoner Jajasamu!

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Ye've been to see them two youngsters, then?

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Huh... So, that's the way of it, eh?

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Well, I shouldn't be surprised considerin' the example they've been given to follow.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: An' now that I know how they're approachin' these fights, I can adjust me own tactics accordingly. One's passionate, an' the other's reckless, so they'll both need some watchful support.

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: I'll do what I can to stand in for ye, though I doubt I'll ever replace ye. Aye, they'll call me “the second-best summoner in Eorzea”─how's that for humble!?

dialogue.name: JAJASAMULALASAMU
dialogue.text: Right, I think it's past time I was on me way. Give me best to Y'mhitra, Forename, an' thanks for humorin' me request!

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: Everything went well with the lieutenant, I trust?

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: I won't pry into the details, but I am glad to see you looking so content.

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: To master summoning is an arduous journey, yet I imagine the going is made far smoother with a mentor such as you. I am somewhat envious of your younger colleagues.

dialogue.name: YMHITRA
dialogue.text: And if I am to mirror their progress, I must not allow my own scholarly research to fall by the wayside! Good day to you, Forename!
